subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan's Capital and Its Historical Importance
question_en: What is the significance of Jaipur as the capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: जयपुर राजस्थान की राजधानी है। इसका क्या विविधि है?
A_en: Jaipur is the largest city in Rajasthan.
